apps.title: SIX Emotional Wellness Tracker
apps.description: SIX turns the Apple Watch or wearable you already own into a personal dashboard for mental and emotional wellness. Using 20+ years of neuroscience, it reveals what lifts your energy, lowers your stress, and helps you thrive. You’ll see exactly how your brain responds to everyday moments—so you can do more of what moves you and less of what drains you. WHAT YOU GET WITH SIX • Live Emotional Fitness Scores: See how your brain responds in real time—measured as Value (emotional resonance) and Safety (stress vs. calm). • Daily Key Moments: Automatically capture the six most emotionally meaningful moments your brain experiences each day. • Mood & Energy Forecasts: Know how you’ll feel tomorrow—plan, recover, and perform with clarity. • Local Recommendations: Personalized suggestions for local finds, media, and podcasts that are likely to create Key Moments for you. • Personalized Insights: Discover what fuels your mood, energy, and focus—and repeat what works. • No Extra Hardware Needed: Works with Apple Watch, WHOOP, Oura Ring, Fitbit, Garmin & more. WHO IT’S FOR SIX is built for anyone who wants to live more intentionally and feel more like themselves—whether you’re tracking health goals or avoiding burnout. Perfect for: • Biohackers and self-optimizers • People focused on stress recovery or burnout prevention • Coaches and therapists who want to track client emotional fitness • Anyone already tracking sleep, recovery, or heart rate WHY IT WORKS SIX measures your brain’s emotional response using biometric signals tied to oxytocin and dopamine—neurochemicals behind motivation, connection, and well-being. You’ll finally have an objective, science-backed view of what helps you feel and function at your best. No journaling. No guesswork. SAFE, PRIVATE & SECURE Biometric data never leaves your phone, and your emotional data is encrypted, anonymized, and never sold. You’re always in control—only you can choose to share your data. GET STARTED ON YOUR EMOTIONAL FITNESS JOURNEY 1. Download SIX (it’s FREE!) 2. Connect your compatible wearable 3. Start tracking your emotional fitness and uncovering your Key Moments GO PREMIUM FOR DEEPER INSIGHTS Beyond free features, new users get an exclusive 5-day trial of SIX Premium: -Full history of your daily scores -Monthly mood and energy views -Top 5 & bottom 5 emotional moments -Forecasts of future energy & mood -View Key Moments for friends -Live emotional data (past hour & day) -Ability to invite others to see if their brain loves your content Subscription Details -Auto-renewing subscription for SIX Premium -Subscription price may vary based on location -Payment charged to iTunes Account at time of purchase -Subscription charged to credit card via iTunes account -Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before current period ends -Free 5-day Premium trial cannot be canceled once activated; any unused portion of the trial period is forfeited if you delete the app -Manage or cancel your subscription anytime in our app via Settings or your App Store Account Settings. We cannot cancel it on your behalf. For help, email support@your6.com Follow us: @thesixapp on Instagram & TikTok Learn more: https://your6.com Privacy Policy: https://your6.com/privacy Terms of Service: https://your6.com/legal

apps.title: Kun Being: Workforce Wellness
apps.description: Welcome to Kun Being, the ultimate platform for stress relief, productivity, and corporate wellness. Our dynamic platform is focused on promoting wellness and meditation for the workforce, serving Arabic speakers globally. At Kun Being, we understand the pressures of modern life, and we're here to help you manage stress, improve productivity, and enhance your overall health and wellbeing. Our platform offers a range of tools and resources, including meditation and breathing exercises, mindfulness practices, and relationship-building strategies. Kun Being App is designed to help you manage your stress and prevent burnout, allowing you to stay focused and productive throughout the workday. We understand that stress can impact your emotional and physical health, which is why we're committed to providing you with the support you need to maintain a healthy work-life balance. What to expect from using Kun Being? • Dealing with Anxiety & Reducing Stress • Self-Love & Compassion • Focus & Concentration • Reduce stress & Self-care • Increase positivity • Improve the level of focus • Improve energy levels • Improve sleep • Designed for stress relief Our platform features a variety of meditation and breathing exercises that can help you relax, reduce anxiety, and improve your overall sense of wellbeing. We also offer resources to help you build stronger relationships with your colleagues and loved ones, enhancing your social and emotional wellness. Kun Being is the ultimate destination for corporate wellness, offering a range of resources and tools to help you build a healthier, happier workforce. Our platform is designed to help you promote mindfulness, reduce stress, and improve employee health and wellbeing. Whether you're looking to improve your own health and wellness or enhance the productivity and wellbeing of your team, Kun Being has everything you need to succeed. So why wait? Download our app today and start experiencing the benefits of stress relief, productivity, and corporate wellness for yourself! At Kun Being, we believe that corporate wellness is essential for maintaining a healthy and productive workforce. Our platform is designed to promote health and wellbeing in all aspects of life, from physical health to mental and emotional wellbeing. With Kun Being, you'll have access to a comprehensive set of tools and resources that will help you achieve your wellness goals and thrive in your professional and personal life. Kun Being App Features: • Guided Meditations: A range of guided meditations for different themes and lengths, designed to reduce stress, promote mindfulness, and improve emotional well-being. • Mindfulness Exercises: Mindfulness exercises and techniques to help users increase awareness and presence, reduce stress, and improve emotional regulation. • Breathing Exercises: Breathing exercises and techniques designed to improve focus, reduce stress, and promote relaxation. • Progress Tracking: Tools for tracking user progress, providing insights into the frequency and duration of meditation sessions over time, helping users stay motivated, and measure the benefits of meditation on their health. • Corporate Wellness Programs: Corporate wellness programs that can be customized for businesses, providing workshops on mindfulness, stress management, and other topics to improve the mental health and productivity of employees. We also believe that strong relationships are key to a healthy work-life balance. That's why we offer exercises and resources designed to help you improve your communication skills and build stronger, more meaningful connections with your colleagues and loved ones. So why wait? Download Kun Being today and start taking control of your health and wellbeing. With our app, you'll have everything you need to manage stress, improve productivity, and enhance your overall quality of life.

apps.title: Walkingspree
apps.description: Walkingspree: Transforming Workplace Wellbeing through Fun Group Activity Programs Walkingspree partners with employers and insurers to reduce healthcare costs by encouraging members to stay active through an engaging and motivating group program. Our innovative wellness solution leverages modern technology to deliver proven results. Learn more at [www.walkingspree.com] Program Overview The Walkingspree Activity program seamlessly integrates with Fitbit, Garmin, Apple Health, and Smartphones to track daily progress, set goals, and compete in fun, company-wide challenges. Our open platform also connects with Apple Health Kit and Google Fit, allowing almost any activity tracker or mobile app to share validated data with Walkingspree. This makes it easy for members to join using their existing devices. Membership Details This program is exclusively available to members whose employers or health insurers sponsor Walkingspree. Your participation is funded by your sponsor. Features - Goal Setting & Tracking: Quickly set personal and program goals and monitor your progress. - Detailed Statistics: View your activity statistics by day, week, month, quarter, year, or a custom date range. - Top Walkers: See the top performers in your group and track your ranking. - Team Competitions: Stay motivated with team challenges. - Social Engagement: Invite friends, compare stats, and motivate each other. - Challenge Tracking: View your individual and team challenge progress. - Fun Challenges: Participate in virtual walks, nutrition challenges, team tournaments, and more. - Achievement Badges & Points: Earn badges and points for your activities and challenges, which employers may use for incentives. - Device Syncing: Automatically syncs with Fitbit, Garmin Connect, Google Fit, Apple Health, or Samsung Health. - Progress Notifications: Receive updates for challenges, badges, and program news. - Online Store: Browse and purchase activity trackers. Employers may enable payroll deduct or offer subsidies for purchases. - Comprehensive Member Support: Access built-in support for device and program assistance. - Customizable Appearance: Choose from three image sets to tailor the app's look for your organization. - White-Glove Account Management: Enjoy premium account management services. - Food & Calorie Tracking: Log your meals and calories on the go with access to a database of 65,000 food items and 7,000 recipes. Track calories burned versus consumed. Need Help? Experiencing issues with setup, device connection, or the program? Contact us via the app or at support@walkingspree.com Interested in our Workplace Wellbeing Program? For inquiries about employer-sponsored programs, please reach out to us at [sales@walkingspree.com]

apps.title: Simple Habit Sleep, Meditation
apps.description: Simple Habit is the #1 app for your wellness & sleep recommended by top mental health experts. Try Simple Habit for free today and join over 5 million people on this life-changing journey. Sleep better and be happier in your life, marriage, parenthood, work, and health. Our wellness & sleep therapy sessions offer guided mindfulness & meditation, daily motivation, guided sleep sessions and coaching by world-renowned experts, personalized for the way you live your life. We’ll help you feel less stressed, get better sleep and be your best self whether you have 5 minutes in the morning, 20 minutes during your commute or need to fall asleep quickly. Start your Simple Habit today and live better every day. FEATURED ON * Shark Tank Season Premiere 2017 * #1 in Apple’s "New Apps We Love” 2016 * #1 in Apple's "Health & Fitness - Meditation & Mindfulness" 2016 WHY SIMPLE HABIT? MINDFULNESS AND MEDITATION • Just 5-minutes of mindfulness and meditation per day can improve your life through stress relief and improved sleep • New meditation guided by the world’s best experts, from mindfulness experts at Google to former monks • Track your progress and stay motivated with Mindful Minutes • Access meditations offline with our Premium subscription so you can meditate at any time WELLNESS FOR YOUR BUSY LIFESTYLE • Perfect for busy lifestyles— listen when you wake up, drive, or go to sleep • Sessions designed for life’s daily problems • Use Simple Habit's On-the-Go feature to quickly calm your anxiety to achieve a sense of mindfulness HEALTH AND RELAXATION • Sleep better • Relieve stress • Manage anxiety and depression • And more FIND MOTIVATION • Coaching content • Motivational talks • Streak tracking and mindful minutes to track your progress BENEFITS OF USING SIMPLE HABIT • Build a meditation habit • Get a better night’s sleep • Motivation in your pocket • Improve focus • Reduce stress and anxiety • Stay calm and relaxed • Increased self-awareness • Be an effective leader • Breathe deeper and easier • Increased sense of perspective • Achieve mindfulness on the go • Calm down and relax at the end of a long day • Tackle different life challenges in a calm, focused manner • Improve relationships • Be happier, more relaxed, and calm APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION • Optionally integrate your meditations with Apple Health by connecting your meditations with Mindful Minutes! • Accept the prompt to allow Simple Habit to record your mindful minutes in Apple Health, or manually turn it on in Settings. GET UNLIMITED ACCESS WITH PREMIUM Simple Habit offers two auto-renewing subscription options to help you achieve mindfulness and breathe easier. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when a subscription is purchased. These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. CONNECT WITH SIMPLE HABIT Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/simplehabitapp/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/simplehabitapp/ Twitter - https://twitter.com/simplehabitapp Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us at feedback@simplehabit.com. Thanks for using Simple Habit :) Privacy Policy - https://www.simplehabit.com/privacy Terms and Conditions - https://www.simplehabit.com/tos

apps.title: Lume: Stress & Wellness Coach
apps.description: Lume: Your Path to Stress-Free Living Lume is your personal stress tracker and wellness companion, designed to help you understand, manage, and reduce stress in your daily life. Whether you're dealing with work pressures, personal challenges, or just looking to improve your overall well-being, Lume provides the tools and insights you need to stay balanced and in control. KEY FEATURES Proactive Monitoring & Red Zone Alerts: Stay one step ahead by detecting potential stressors before they escalate. Get notified when your stress or anxiety levels reach critical points, so you can take immediate action. Personal Check-Ins & Tailored Suggestions: Regular check-ins keep you connected to your mental well-being. Receive personalized recommendations, like taking a walk or connecting with friends, to help you manage stress effectively. Progress Tracking & Comprehensive Insights: Track your journey with detailed analytics and gain insights into your stress patterns. See your progress over time and make informed decisions to enhance your well-being. WHY CHOOSE LUME? Lume is more than just a stress tracker—it's a comprehensive tool for enhancing your mental well-being. By focusing on daily wellness pillars, Lume encourages you to live a balanced life, helping you reduce stress and improve your overall health. Our science-backed techniques and personalized insights fit seamlessly into your daily routine, empowering you to take control of your stress and live a more fulfilling life. Take the First Step to a Calmer You Download Lume today and start your journey towards a stress-free life. With Lume, you’re never alone in your wellness journey—discover how our app can help you achieve greater peace of mind, one day at a time. SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS Download and use Lume for free. Choose among auto-renewing subscriptions to upgrade to Lume Pro. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. Lume writes & reads your data from HealthKit. Processing happens and stays on your device. Always. Lume is NOT a medical device nor a substitute for medical advice. For that, stick to your physician. Terms of service: https://tranquiltech.io/lume/terms Privacy policy: https://tranquiltech.io/lume/privacy

apps.title: Therabody
apps.description: The Therabody app gives you personalized guidance on how to recover faster, enhance athletic performance, reduce tension, and even sleep better with your Therabody products. Based on your unique needs, activity tracking, and now with Coach: Intelligent recovery planning designed to help you perform – and feel – better every day. Once you pair with a compatible Theragun massage gun, SmartGoggles eye and temple massager, SleepMask, RecoveryAir or JetBoots compression pants, WaveRoller, WaveDuo, WaveSolo muscle rollers, ThermBack LED advanced back wrap, or TheraFace PRO LED light and microcurrent facial device, you can start moving towards your fitness, wellness, and skincare goals. A COACH IN YOUR POCKET Powered by AI, Coach by Therabody creates intelligent, personalized recovery plans based on your fitness goals, activity data, and latest scientific research. Designed for Theragun, Coach updates your recovery plan daily with your activities and changing needs. It notifies you in real-time with customized, science-backed recommendations to help you use your Theragun for more effective recovery. ACTIVITY TRACKING AND WEARABLES SYNCING Record activities using your favorite health and fitness wearable devices or apps. You can track runs, walks, hikes, bike rides, workouts, yoga, and dozens more. Just sync the Therabody app with your favorite device including Garmin, Apple Health and Strava, and your activities from your connected wearables will sync in real-time so that you have the most effective recovery plan based on your day. MASSAGE GUN TRACKING Theragun is the only massage gun that syncs your recovery data to a fitness app in real time — tracking therapy types, session length and speed, even when you’re not using the app*. That means you’ll always get credit for your recovery sessions and receive personalized recommendations tailored to your routine. GUIDED ROUTINES DESIGNED BY EXPERTS Eliminate any guesswork and explore our library of step-by-step guided routines that show exactly how to use your device, where to use it on your body, and for how long. From recovering your legs after a long run, to relieving that pesky back pain after a long workday, you’ll find the treatment you need, designed by our team of science and physiology experts including physical therapists, trainers, chiropractors, and scientists. BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY FOR ADVANCED CONTROLS With Bluetooth connectivity, use the Therabody app to fine-tune your settings with more precise control. Adjust the exact speed of your Theragun, tweak the heat on your SmartGoggles, adjust the LED light for your TheraFace PRO, or soften the vibration of your Wave Roller to provide your body what feels best. Plus, routines will automatically apply any recommended settings and tell you when to switch positions or attachments. *Offline session tracking only available for Theragun PRO Plus, Theragun Prime Plus, Theragun Sense (1st and 2nd Gen), Theragun Prime 6th Gen, and Theragun Mini 3rd Gen.

apps.title: Fullscript
apps.description: Manage your supplement and medication routine with tools that keep you on track. The Fullscript app gives you a way to order high-quality, clinically-effective supplements. It also gives you the tools you need to keep your wellness on track, no matter how busy life gets. With easy-to-use tools and features, it’s a simple way to manage your supplement and medication routine, as well as work more closely with your provider—all in one place. Tools to stay on track Unlock exclusive, mobile-only tools like dose reminders and medication tracking. You can also access Fullscript features like auto refills, or refill on-the-go in just a few taps. Provider guidance 24/7 By using Fullscript, you’ll be giving your provider a better view of your routine so they’ll be able to suggest products, give insights, and adjust doses in real time. Order trusted products the easy way Use Fullscript to easily order leading supplements right to your door with fast, free shipping on orders over USD $50 and CAD $150. Quality Assured We invest $10 million annually in our Fullscript Quality Program, making sure you and your provider can trust the products that support your care. Currently, the app is only available to patients in the US and Canada.

apps.title: Revitalize Wellness
apps.description: Welcome to Revitalize Wellness – Your Path to Optimal Health! Founded in 2017 by Katie and Craig Gironda, Revitalize Wellness is more than a supplement company—it’s a mission rooted in the power of orthomolecular medicine. Katie’s journey began with frustration over her declining health and conventional medicine’s limitations. In 2014, an online health board introduced her to the life-changing benefits of Vitamin C. Inspired by her recovery, she created the Vitamin C and Orthomolecular Medicine for Optimal Health Facebook group, now a thriving community of over 90,000 members sharing scientific insights and healing stories. Determined to make high-quality supplements accessible, Katie and Craig launched Revitalize Wellness, prioritizing purity and affordability. In 2023, new owners—Hendrick, Marlene, and Jason Klop—joined the mission, bringing fresh expertise to continue delivering premium wellness solutions.

apps.title: Alive by Whitney Simmons
apps.description: It’s a beautiful day to be Alive! Placing your physical and mental wellness at the forefront, Alive was designed to offer a safe and empowering space for women to build strength, confidence, and lifelong habits. Created by fitness experts, Alive meets you exactly where you are in your journey and guides you toward becoming your strongest, most confident self from the inside and out Alive App Features - Simple, intuitive design focused on your workout experience - 20+ guided programs to match your goals and fitness level - 30-day mental & physical wellness challenges - 200+ daily workouts to mix and match - Beginner, Intermediate, and advance difficulty levels - Select between gym and at-home equipment options Meet the Trainers - Whitney Simmons - Leads with a well rounded strength training, focused to help maximize strength utilizing progressive overload, and creating a balanced physique. - Madeleine Abeid - Certified classic mat Pilates instructor with experience in sculpt & fusion practice. Bringing mat pilates to Alive in a follow along format. - Libby Christensen - Brings your strength to the next level by utilizing progressive overload training adaptions with an emphasis on compound movements - Marissa McNamara - Uses her power training systems to build maximum strength, placing an emphasis on compound movements. - Felicia Keathley - Primarily focuses to help you master essential and foundational exercises. Also known for her pregnancy and postpartum programing. Programs Choose from over 20 expert-designed programs. Each program guides you through a structured schedule across several week so you can focus less on planning and more on showing up. Challenges Our 30-day challenges are where fitness and mindfulness meet with daily journal prompts, mobility sessions, and habits to support your mental and physical well-being. Daily Workouts Don’t want a set program? Choose from 200+ daily workouts across categories like HIIT, core, pull, push, and more. Perfect for mixing things up or staying on track when life gets busy. Your Journey The path to a fit, healthy life is a journey, not an overnight process. Stay motivated by logging weight, photos, and completed workouts. See your growth over time and earn achievements along the way. Sync with Apple Health for a complete view of your activity. Alive Premium Alive is free to download with Premium plans (Monthly or Annual), both with a 7-day free trial. Premium unlocks full access to all programs, challenges, and daily workouts. Your subscription will be charged to your Apple account and will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You may manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. After purchase, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. You agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions by downloading and subscribing to Alive Premium. https://aliveapp.co/terms https://aliveapp.co/privacy

apps.title: SoWa Health + Wellness.
apps.description: We aim to be an essential element in the daily pursuit of health and wellness for individuals and communities by providing results-driven fitness experiences and meaningful social connections in an encouraging and inclusive environment. Our app gives our members access to all their benefits and more and helps bring the SoWa Health + Wellness community with them everywhere they go. With the app, you can: -View and reserve a spot in group fitness classes -Book time in our Trackman Golf Simulator Bays -Book sessions with Personal Trainers -Reserve time in our two recovery lounges -Contact and connect with our team -Stay in-the-know on important announcements and events APPLE HEALTHKIT We also use HealthKit to allow users to share their activity and workout data with the app. This data is used to incentivise users to stay active.

apps.title: Serenity: Wellness Tracker
apps.description: Transform Your Mornings, Transform Your Life “The quality of your morning determines the rest of your day!” Start each day with purpose and productivity using the Morning Routine Habit Tracker. Reduce decision fatigue, stay focused, and accomplish more everyday. “It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.” — Tony Robbins Featured on Product Hunt “Great Product! I find the mornings are a great time to make important decisions for the day.” KEY FEATURES • Create Unlimited Habits Customize your routine with unlimited habits. • Voice Guidance Enable Voice Over for hands-free voice instructions. • Build Unlimited Routines Design morning, night, school, gym routines, and more. (Premium feature) • Daily Reminders Stay on track with helpful notifications. • Flexible Scheduling Select specific weekdays for each routine. • Routine Tracking Build, adjust, and monitor your routines to develop the best habits. • Smart Timer Set a time for each task once and reuse it daily. • Short breathing session. Take a minute to focus your mind with integrated breathing exercises, synced with the Health App’s mindfulness minutes. BOOST YOUR PRODUCTIVITY Our smart timer guides you smoothly from one activity to the next, even if your phone is locked. Receive timely notifications to keep you on schedule. ENHANCE YOUR FOCUS Join successful people who follow structured morning routines to achieve their goals. Focus on key activities that drive progress in your life. TRACK YOUR PROGRESS View detailed stats from the past week or month to see how you’re spending your time. Identify areas for improvement and celebrate your consistency. USER-FRIENDLY FEATURES • Prevent Screen Lock Keep the timer visible by preventing automatic screen lock within the app. • Custom Alerts Choose between sound alerts, vibrations, or both. • Offline Functionality No internet connection required; all data is stored on your device. BIG SCREEN READY • Screen mirroring capable fills your big screen with the routine's image + live timer FEEL BETTER EVERY DAY Completing small tasks boosts satisfaction and fosters positive thinking, leading to increased productivity and well-being. WHAT OUR USERS SAY • “Great idea and design. I try to be more effective in the morning but my time management isn’t good. :)” • “Super helpful. Love not having to think about the order of my routine each day. Good work!” • “I was one of the people who complained about the design of the app. The redesign looks much better.” START YOUR TRANSFORMATION TODAY If you’ve read books like The Miracle Morning, The Slight Edge, or The Compound Effect but struggled to implement their strategies, this app is your solution. Track your time, build new habits, and make lasting changes. DOWNLOAD NOW AND SEE GREAT IMPROVEMENTS IN YOUR LIFE!

apps.description: Transform your mind & body with 1500+ meditation, pranayamas & asanas. Join free daily yoga classes. Try free for 7 days – No upfront payment commitment A journey of a 1000 miles begins with a small step. Take the first step of your wellness journey with Nispand. Developed by the legendary The Yoga Institute, the world’s oldest yoga institute with over 106 years of yogic wisdom, Nispand is the First of its kind and the ONLY Wellness App that brings together yoga asanas for physical fitness, strength & flexibility; Meditations & pranayamas for mental wellbeing, calmness & peace; Expert Health insights through workshops, courses & masterclasses; Daily 1 hr free live online yoga classes; 1-1 consultations for diet & counselling; Health tracking, etc. – You have it All in One App. Nispand is truly a Wellness Superapp. In Nispand, Yoga is as in scriptures. Simplified but Not Modified - “Yoga Made Simple” for the common man. The content is from The Yoga Institute – Authentic and well researched. Nispand has been honoured as a winner in Startup India’s Yoga Tech Challenge 2024, supported by the Ministry of AYUSH. Why Choose Nispand? Nispand offers a comprehensive and structured approach to holistic wellness that blends authentic traditional yogic wisdom with cutting edge technology. 1000+ meditations & pranayamas that helps to manage stress, sleep better, improve mental clarity & emotional well-being. 500+ asanas to build physical strength and for fitness & flexibility. Yoga on the go: Short & effective Yoga Sessions - 10 Minutes Yoga, 90 sec Meditations, Yoga at work. A special section for yoga specifically curated for women. A special section for managing lifestyle related disorders like hypertension, diabetes, back & joint pains, respiratory problems, etc. Get Health insights form experts from the free courses and workshops. Get personalised expert consultations for diet, counselling and 1-1 asana sessions. Daily 1 hr free online live yoga classes for those who prefer live classes and to facilitate habit building. Nispand has it all. All in One place. So Your Wellness is in your Palms. Practice yoga for What ever you want, When ever & Where ever you want and for What ever time that you may have at hand. Key Features of Nispand For Your Mind: 1000+ Guided Meditations for better sleep, focus, stress relief, and personality development. Ancient Mantras & Chants to restore inner peace. Pranayama & Breathing exercises to calm your mind. Binaural Beats & Solfeggio Frequencies for deeper relaxation. For Your Body: 500+ Asana videos to build flexibility, strength, and detox your body. Customized Yoga Routines for beginners to advanced practitioners. Targeted Yoga Programs for weight loss, mobility, and endurance. Live Interaction Daily Live free online interactive yoga sessions led by certified experienced instructors Personalized Health Insights & Consultations – Get 1-on-1 sessions with yoga experts, dieticians, mental wellness counsellors, and therapists. Health Insights & Wellness Workshops: Expert-Led Courses & Workshops on Happiness, stress management, pranayama and detox. Masterclasses - Online sessions covering multiple topics on yoga & wellness For Holistic Growth & Tracking: Comprehensive Progress Tracking to monitor your wellness journey. Recommendations for yoga and meditation based on ML algorithms. Sync with Health & Fitness Trackers to optimize results. Curated soundscapes & playlists to enhance focus and relaxation. Nispand is created by The Yoga Institute, backed by 106+ years of yoga expertise. A pioneer in making authentic yogic wisdom accessible to modern lifestyles. Our techniques are scientifically researched, time-tested, and deeply rooted in traditional yoga philosophy. Join a global movement toward mindful living. Empower yourself with Nispand’s holistic wellness solutions and take control of your wellbeing today!

apps.title: SociEATy: Non-Diet Wellness
apps.description: The SociEATy App will be your guide to building a healthy, balanced, diet-free lifestyle. Created by a Registered Dietitian, the app uses an evidence-based mix of education, gentle nutrition, reflection, and support to guide you through giving up diets, strengthening hunger and fullness cues, breaking food rules, improving body image, self-care management and building a healthy relationship with all aspects of health and wellness that lasts a lifetime. WHAT’S INSIDE: DIET-FREE MEAL PLANNER: Learn how to fuel your body from a place of self-care to feel and be your best, healthiest and happiest self… all with no food rules! MINDFULNESS JOURNAL: Our one-of-a-kind journal will guide you through learning how to listen to your body instead of diets, plans and rules. We even wrap up all of your entries into an easy-to-digest weekly summary so you can easily identify areas of strength and ones for improvement- making navigating your journey easy and crystal clear! SELF-CARE HABIT TRACKER: You get to decide what, when and how self-care looks for you. Use our optional “Self-Care Cups” feature to stay mindful and reminded of your chosen self-care habits on a daily basis. GUIDED TOOLS & ACTIVITIES: We’ve got you covered for everything from eating habits (mindful eating, food guilt, nutrition tips, etc.), to movement, body image, and mental/emotional wellbeing. Our Self-Care Toolbox will be your go-to for help in managing anything life throws your way! HUNDREDS OF RECIPES: Never question if your meals are “good enough” again. All recipes are created by a Registered Dietitian with helpful descriptions and tips to make not only fueling your body easy but understanding why and how incredibly simple! We’ve got everything you need from recipes that nourish the body to ones that nourish the soul. The SociEATy app was created by Registered Dietitian, Colleen Christensen (@no.food.rules). If you’re looking for a balanced, sustainable approach to intuitive eating that makes it easy- this app is for you! A one-stop-shop to replace all of your other diet-culture driven food logging, meal planner, and habit tracking apps. Privacy Policy: https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/privacy-policy Subscription Terms https://www.colleenchristensennutrition.com/subscription-terms Terms & Conditions: https://members.colleenchristensennutrition.com/terms-and-conditions/

apps.title: Peak Health & Wellness Center
apps.description: The Peak Health & Wellness Center and Peak West Bank Landing of Great Falls, Montana offers two state-of-the-art facilities with first-class equipment, three studios, pools, gymnasium, racquetball and squash courts, a knowledgeable and friendly staff, and a squeaky clean environment. With the Peak App, you can check-in, register for classes, track your physical activity, participate in fitness challenges, and receive important updates directly from the Club. Looking to stream classes to your phone or home computer? Talk to us about virtual classes! You have it all in the Peak App. The Peak App is free and will keep you up-to-date on Peak happenings, including member functions and new additions. The Peak Health & Wellness Center app uses the Health app (HealthKit) that is pre-installed on your iPhone to sync nutrients and workouts data. Because of this, the app will ask you to grant read and write access to your nutrients and workouts data. Your Health sync data is only visible to you and is not sent to anyone but yourself.

apps.title: Avibra: Well-Being & Benefits
apps.description: Avibra is the #1-rated insurance, finance, and well-being app that turns good habits and positive steps into insurance coverage. Each time you open our free app to read wellness tips, take a quiz, watch videos or listen to meditations, your insurance coverage grows—at no cost to you. Plus, you’ll improve your health, finances, career, relationships and community in the process. Earn $15,000 of insurance by engaging with our app Get weekly notifications about new content you can use and apply in order to build your insurance coverage without spending a dime. This content includes: Guided Meditations—boost your mental and physical health. Quizzes—make learning fun while you improve your well-being. Videos—get inspired, plus learn more about health, finances, and work. Brain Workouts—strengthen your brain activity and improve memory. Gratitude Journal—re-discover what you’re grateful for. 10 Tips—improve your health, relationships and finances. Avibra Yoga Studio—bring calm, peace, and balance to your life. Relaxation Music—ease everyday stress and anxiety. Bonus: Also turn your daily activities from your wearables into rewards (think Fitbit, Apple Health, Google Fit). The Dollar Benefits Store Welcome to our Dollar Benefits Store, where you can buy peace of mind for just $1/week. Purchase one benefit or several—just pay $1/week for each one you choose. Accident Medical Benefits: Your accident medical benefit helps protect you from those high hospital bills following a covered accident such as a broken bone, concussion or burn. Accidental Death & Dismemberment (AD&D) Benefits: Provides a benefit payment to you or your beneficiaries if you become disabled or die in a fatal accident. Telemedicine: Unlimited 24/7 virtual visits, 365 days a year. Telemedicine doctors can provide treatment and advice for allergies, sports injuries, skin inflammations and more. Teletherapy: Online therapy available 7 days a week. Teletherapy counselors can provide treatment for conditions like depression, stress, eating disorders, addiction, relationship problems, anxiety, grief and more. Life Insurance: Paid out in a single lump sum to your beneficiary upon your death, life insurance protects your loved ones when you’re gone. The money is commonly used for funeral costs, medical bills and day-to-day bills. Cell Phone Protection: For damage (including water damage) and theft. Risk Advisor: To monitor your risks in life, your Risk Advisor includes myRadar, myDwelling, myHealth and myRide. Each feature allows you to check for common everyday risks. The Risk Advisor uses information about your location, real-time driving habits and more to help you live smarter and safer. Critical Illness: This benefit covers cancer, heart attack, stroke, and renal failure. The fixed lump-sum cash benefit can be used to help pay out-of-pocket medical expenses like deductibles and co-pays, or non-medical expenses like grocery delivery, childcare, and more. Roadside Assistance: For towing, emergency tire changes, lockout, battery and fuel delivery service. Our commitment to you Avibra is a socially-driven company at its core, and we give back to the community on an ongoing basis. Avibra works with TIST to plant a tree each month for active users, donates regularly to important social causes, and helps you anonymously protect another family in a different state each week when you stay active in the app. Plus, enjoy myShield for additional insurance options Find other affordable insurance plans available for purchase in-app, including home insurance, auto insurance, renters insurance, and pet insurance. We partner with reputable sources like Hippo Insurance, ASPCA, MSI and Matic. Live A VIBRAnt life with Avibra and enjoy peace of mind you can afford. Download the app now. By downloading and using Avibra, you agree to our current Terms of Use (https://www.avibra.com/Avibra_TermsofService.pdf) and Privacy Policy (https://www.avibra.com/Avibra_PrivacyPolicy.pdf)

apps.title: Blue Wellness Rewards
apps.description: Are you looking for a fun and easy-to-navigate way of managing your health? There's no need to feel lost on this journey anymore! Blue Wellness Rewards is here to help. We'll make sure you have your personal map and guide you along the path to a healthier life! Blue Wellness Rewards is here to empower you with unique tools to help you: • Understand your health • Know the specific steps you can take to get better or stay healthy • Earn fun rewards along the way • Track your activities using Apple Health and other connected devices (if applicable). Let's do this together and make your health a priority! Note: Blue Wellness Rewards is only available to eligible individuals. What's Included? • To do list: a prioritized list of healthy actions you can take to earn rewards. • Health Library: a library of topics designed to help you get or stay healthy. • Rewards: redeem your earned rewards for gift cards and merchandise from some of the nation's top retailers. • Message Center: be notified when you have new or completed actions, when new health insights are available, and when you have rewards to redeem. THIS APPLICATION DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE. The information and other material contained on this application is for informational purposes only and is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content, including text, graphics, images and information, contained on or available through this application is for general informational purposes only. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding medical conditions or before undertaking a new healthcare regimen. NEVER DISREGARD PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY SEEKING MEDICAL TREATMENT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ OR ACCESSED THROUGH THIS APPLICATION.

Blue Wellness Rewards is here to empower you with unique tools to help you: • Understand your health • Know the specific steps you can take to get better or stay healthy • Earn fun rewards along the way • Track your activities using Apple Health and other connected devices (if applicable). Let's do this together and make your health a priority! Note: Blue Wellness Rewards is only available to eligible individuals. What's Included? • To do list: a prioritized list of healthy actions you can take to earn rewards. • Health Library: a library of topics designed to help you get or stay healthy. • Rewards: redeem your earned rewards for gift cards and merchandise from some of the nation's top retailers. • Message Center: be notified when you have new or completed actions, when new health insights are available, and when you have rewards to redeem. THIS APPLICATION DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE. The information and other material contained on this application is for informational purposes only and is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content, including text, graphics, images and information, contained on or available through this application is for general informational purposes only. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding medical conditions or before undertaking a new healthcare regimen. NEVER DISREGARD PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY SEEKING MEDICAL TREATMENT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ OR ACCESSED THROUGH THIS APPLICATION.

apps.title: Stressbusters Wellness
apps.description: Meet your new wellness assistant! Everyday, the Stressbusters app hands you your latest campus and community event happenings, exclusive how-to videos, rapid relaxation tracks, special offers, and a place to store and share your favorite health-enhancers. Success requires wellness, and the Stressbusters app updates, inspires, teaches, tames and feeds you what you need to succeed where you are and when you need it. Get the dates, times and locations of the next Stressbusters and other local wellness events. Learn from the exclusive Videostream of guru interviews and demos from around the world and around you. Chill instantly with Quick Calm, Go Coastal and other timeout tracks in the Break Pad sonic spa. Join Stressbusters app'ers everywhere who are making health their prerequisite for life. Launch the app, choose your location and let the Stressbusters app do the rest. Your campus wellness team will keep you in the know about local activities, resources and important news. Stressbusters will put even more health in your hands with segments to improve your sleep, focus, energy, test taking, interviews, athletic performances, public speaking, nutrition, moods and just about everything else.

apps.title: Revolve Wellness Studios
apps.description: We Make it Easy to Become an Entrepreneur. Revolve empowers personal trainers, instructors, practitioners to do what you do best – teach! Easily rent our first-class fitness and wellness studios to create and grow your own practice. Our affordable gyms and studios include everything you need for Personal Training, Wellness Services, Individual or Group classes, and Meetings or Seminar spaces. Revolve is a NO RISK business opportunity for Instructors, Practitioners, and Trainers looking for affordable space to teach. We rent studios at a 1-hour minimum, for most fitness disciplines. This enables YOU to do what you do best – teach. Create and grow your own practice in a best-in-class facility. We eliminate the stress and financial burdens of having your own facility or working for others. • No Investment • No Hassles • No Leases • No Contracts

apps.title: Global Wellness Challenge
apps.description: The Global Wellness Challenge hosted by Cigna Group is an activities-based employer wellness program promoting healthy lifestyle and getting active through various friendly competition with friends and family! Features include: - Track your activity manually or via supported wearable device like the Apple Watch - Earn points and badges as you make progress towards our personal goal - Attend various social events to get to know other participants - Keep up a streak of active days to lean into a consistent healthy lifestyle - Lead or join a team to keep each other motivated and compete with other teams This app, integrates with HealthKit, shares your activity data with your company to allow tracking of activity minutes for healthy competition with your friends.

apps.title: Manifesting Perfect Wellness
apps.description: This personal coaching app will help you manifest a sense of wellness. Daily messages will inspire you to raise your body’s vibration to a state of perfect health and wellbeing. Regular use may help to improve the health of your body, mind and soul. Whether you are looking to increase your immunity, nurture a healthy body, overcome an illness, uplift your spirits, reduce stress, or maintain your sanity during a world health crisis, this app can help! The guided thoughts and holistic tips in this app will put you in a positive mindset to help you manifest your optimal health. Coupled with gentle guidance of actions, these reminders and suggestions are some of the most powerful ways you can attain physical and mental health. Each day, spend just three minutes listening as Karen delivers three personalized messages that the Universe has selected just for you. Listen after waking up, during lunch or just before bed. They are short enough that you can easily fit them into your busy day. You’ll feel like you’ve gone on a spa retreat for the mind! This app is FREE to download. Get weekly messages, or upgrade to a subscription for daily messages. FEATURES: ▶ BEGIN your day with the right mindset to attract your optimal wellness ▶ RECEIVE three personalized messages selected by the Universe daily/weekly ▶ LISTEN to Karen explain the deeper meaning of your messages ▶ COMPLETE the actions associated with each message ▶ REPLAY your messages any time before the day’s end ▶ REMINDER feature allows you to set a daily reminder ▶ SHARE your personal messages with others ▶ WAKE up to the Audio Wake-Up Alarm feature with the subscription option to remind you to listen to your daily health tips Karen Kripalani, along with her husband, Michel, co-founded Beauty Everywhere and Oceanhouse Media, leading publishers of over 600 mobile apps that uplift, educate and inspire. She has been a student of conscious manifestation for over 20 years. When she was diagnosed with a brain tumor in 2011 she called upon and created some powerful processes that helped to bring her back to perfect health. The tips and lessons contained in this app allowed her to center her mind, reduce stress, practice new modalities, change her unhealthy habits, and attain a sense of wellbeing and wholeness. Have questions or feedback? We’d love to hear! Send us a note at support@oceanhousemedia.com Enjoy the Manifesting Perfect Wellness app with or without a subscription! To access all features, like the alarm and daily messages, sign up for a subscription and save! About the Manifesting Perfect Wellness subscription: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Subscribe monthly or annually to access to all content Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription Privacy Policy http://www.oceanhousemedia.com/privacy/ Terms of Use http://www.oceanhousemedia.com/terms/

apps.title: CARROT Wellness
apps.description: Being active has never been more rewarding! CARROT is a free app that rewards you financially for walking. By walking and achieving individualized activity goals, users earn virtual currencies that can be used to play games, compete in challenges, bid on an auction and earn rewards (such as digital gift cards) that are available right on the app. Those rewards can be won in live, real-time “instant” auctions! CARROT has successfully gamified health and wellness, including several fun features available to all users. “CARROT Survivor” is a last-person-standing competition that challenges contestants to make their personal goals each and every day. “Versus” contests include weekly fantasy football competitions during the fall as well as similar games throughout the year. And CARROT’s “Unlockables” requires you to achieve a personal goal streak to access special prizes. CARROT offers iPhone users several great features: (1) Using Apple HealthKit, CARROT gives you a personalized “Activity Goal”, based on your own activity history, which is updated daily. Push yourself just a little bit more each day, make your personal goals, and then reap the rewards! (2) CARROT’s Apple Watch app allows users to conveniently monitor their daily activity progress with just a tap. (3) Using iBeacon technology, users can earn bonus Reward Points for activities such as community health programs and for visiting participating businesses. This is done in the background with low-energy Bluetooth. (4) And as a fully inclusive program, CARROT provides the opportunity for manual wheelchair users to participate by being rewarded for their “pushes”, rather than “steps”. (Note: The use of an Apple Watch is required to accurately collect push data for use on CARROT.) All CARROT users earn one Reward Point for each step they take. Premium Members – including those who are sponsored by their employer through a CARROT Corporate Wellness Program – can also earn CARROTcoins for achieving personalized activity goals. You can get a one-month Premium Membership with an In-App purchase. With CARROT, there’s no need to purchase a wearable tracker – everything, including your steps data and rewards, is stored exclusively on your phone. The app doesn’t even have to be on or running for you to earn points. (But if you already own a tracker, CARROT accepts data from most popular devices.) Would you like your employer to offer CARROT rewards to you and your coworkers? “CARROT Health & Wellness” is a special, low-cost program that offers employees exclusive company-sponsored rewards such as digital gift cards – available directly through the app – just for meeting daily activity goals. Employers can launch their own CARROT Wellness pilot program by entering their information on the CARROT “Wellness” screen. Because CARROT respects your privacy, you have the option to sign in using your phone number, Facebook or anonymously. Anonymous (“Guest”) users should beware that, since all data is stored only on the device, you will permanently lose all relevant data and earned rewards if you log out or delete the app. Many exclusive rewards are made available based on your location, and you can also receive bonus Reward Points for visiting CARROT businesses and other locations -- so please be sure to allow “location services”. (Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.) Easy to use. Convenient. Personalized. Free. When it comes to Fitness Rewards, nothing beats CARROT!

apps.title: Ohio State: Wellness
apps.description: Finding balance and wellness in your life can feel daunting, but it doesn't have to be that way. The Ohio State University is here to support you in addressing mental health concerns and proactively building behaviors that support your overall wellness. The Ohio State: Wellness app is designed to make it easy to choose the right resources and take action. Use this tool to set goals, develop healthy habits and help someone you care about access the support they need. • Explore all nine dimensions of wellness through blog-style articles and scholarship written with the college experience in mind. • Support your recovery and proactive wellness by connecting with the support resources available to you as an Ohio State student. • Track habits that support your wellness goals. • The Crisis tab provides clear directions for accessing support. This feature is also currently available as I'm Experiencing an Emergency or Crisis in the Ohio State app About You tab. As always, if you have suggestions for improving the app or notice any bugs, please use the contact form within the app. We love to hear from our users!

apps.title: UBYou Campus Wellness
apps.description: UBYou Campus Wellness is aimed to support college student mental health, wellness, and success. UBYou provides access to self-care techniques, meditations, affirmations, education, and daily wellness check-ins to track thoughts and mood. Navigating campus can be difficult so UBYou designed a student success hub for students to find the right resources on campus to support them with ease. UBYou was designed by students for students to provide resources that support individual students' needs and overall student success. Should you have concerns about your physical or mental health please consult a qualified medical practitioner. If you are experiencing an emergency please contact 911.
